an9.22:4.1: * “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅke desessāmi tayo ca purisakhaḷuṅke tayo ca assaparasse tayo ca purisaparasse tayo ca bhadde assājānīye tayo ca bhadde purisājānīye.
an9.22:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha. ()
an9.22:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti, na vaṇṇasampanno, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:5.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:5.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti, na vaṇṇasampanno, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:6.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:6.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti, na vaṇṇasampanno na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an9.22:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an9.22:7.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho saṃsādeti, no vissajjeti.
an9.22:7.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti, na vaṇṇasampanno na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an9.22:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an9.22:8.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an9.22:8.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an9.22:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an9.22:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …

an9.22:10.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.

an9.22:12.2: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an9.22:12.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an9.22:12.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an9.22:12.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:13.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhaddā assājānīyā?
an9.22:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhaddo assājānīyo … pe …
an9.22:13.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:13.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhaddā assājānīyā.
an9.22:14.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhaddā purisājānīyā?
an9.22:14.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhaddo purisājānīyo … pe …
an9.22:14.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:15.2: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an9.22:15.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an9.22:15.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an9.22:15.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhaddo purisājānīyo javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an9.22:15.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhaddā purisājānīyā”ti.
